scenes.background: You justify your assistance. Monica looks anxious.
scenes.description: I understand, but Bob and I were worried about handling such situations ourselves in the future.

options.text: It's crucial to learn from this and be better prepared next time.
options.analysis: You emphasize learning from the experience to improve future preparedness, showing good perception and social skills but could be stronger in empathy.

options.text: I get your concern, but sometimes stepping in is necessary to avoid bigger issues.
options.analysis: You acknowledge their concern while stressing the necessity of intervention, demonstrating good self-regulation and motivation, but social skills could be better.

options.text: If you felt unprepared, we should discuss how to handle these situations next time.
options.analysis: You propose discussing future strategies, showing good empathy and social skills, but the motivation score is lower.
